long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CROMI is the Chrome extension that lets you control your web browsing entirely with voice commands. Easily navigate the web and perform tasks faster and more efficiently with just your voice.

üëâ Key Features
 - Chat
 - Voice dictation
 - Add to bookmarks
 - Add to Google Calendar
 - Retrieve schedule
 - Open specific website
 - Retrieve browsing history
 - Mute current tab
 - Google search
 - Check the weather
 - Get the latest news
 - Close tabs
 - Preview page
 - Set timer

üëâ How to Use
 1. Click the CROMI icon located at the top-right of your browser.
 2. Simply say the command you want, such as ‚ÄúCheck the weather,‚Äù ‚ÄúGoogle search,‚Äù or ‚ÄúClose the current tab.‚Äù
 3. CROMI‚Äôs AI will automatically recognize your command and perform the task for you.

Control your browsing with just your voice, and let CROMI make your web experience faster and smarter!

* The calendar feature is currently disabled.
